name: onboarding
description: Provides information about campaigns and it'c contacts

scripts.dev: npm run setup-consul ; NODE_ENV=development nodemon --inspect=0.0.0.0:56745 --watch src/server src/server/index.js
scripts.test: npm run clean ; nyc mocha **/*.spec.js -R mocha-junit-reporter
scripts.setup-consul: curl -X PUT -d ${MYSQL_DATABASE} http://consul:8500/v1/kv/onboarding/db-init/database ; curl -X PUT -d 'root' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/onboarding/db-init/user ; curl -X PUT -d ${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD} http://consul:8500/v1/kv/onboarding/db-init/password ; curl -X PUT -d 'true' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/onboarding/db-init/populate-test-data ; curl -X PUT -d ${REDIS_AUTH} http://consul:8500/v1/kv/onboarding/redis-auth ; curl -X PUT -d ${REDIS_AUTH} http://consul:8500/v1/kv/onboarding/redis/password ; curl -X PUT -d 'svc_onboarding' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/onboarding/service-client/username ; curl -X PUT -d 'test' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/onboarding/service-client/password ; curl -X PUT -d 'oidcCLIENT' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/onboarding/service-client/client-key ; curl -X PUT -d '91c0fabd17a9db3cfe53f28a10728e39b7724e234ecd78dba1fb05b909fb4ed98c476afc50a634d52808ad3cb2ea744bc8c3b45b7149ec459b5c416a6e8db242' http://consul:8500/v1/kv/onboarding/service-client/client-secret ; curl -X PUT -d ${GATEWAY_SCHEME} http://consul:8500/v1/kv/onboarding/ext-url/scheme ; curl -X PUT -d ${GATEWAY_IP} http://consul:8500/v1/kv/onboarding/ext-url/host ; curl -X PUT -d ${GATEWAY_PORT} http://consul:8500/v1/kv/onboarding/ext-url/port
scripts.rest-doc: mkdir -p wiki/rest-doc ; raml2md -o file-per-resource -p wiki/rest-doc --output-ext=.endpoint.md rest-doc/main.raml
scripts.domain-doc: mkdir -p wiki/domain-doc ; sq2md -o file-per-src -p wiki/domain-doc --init=init --field-bl=createdAt,updatedAt --output-ext=.model.md src/server/db/models
scripts.doc: npm run rest-doc ; npm run domain-doc ; npm run api-doc

author: Daniel Zhitomirsky
